member.name: T:TranslationServices.DataLayer.ServiceAgents.Domain.TranslationArgs
member.summary: A wrap of args for translation.
member.remarks: This class has the benefits of wrapping all the args necessary for a translation request of the implementations of the ITRSTranslationService interface.

member.name: P:TranslationServices.DataLayer.ServiceAgents.Domain.TranslationArgs.TextToTranslate

member.summary: Contains the language of the TextToTranslate.

member.name: P:TranslationServices.DataLayer.ServiceAgents.Domain.TranslationArgs.RequestedLanguages
member.summary: Contains a array of language to translate the TextToTranslate to.

member.summary: Contains the content to translate an its language.

member.name: P:TranslationServices.DataLayer.ServiceAgents.Domain.TranslationArgs2.RequestedLanguages
member.summary: Contains a array of languages to translate the OriginalText to.
